item.title: Searching your Hugo site with Lunr
item.description: Like many software engineers, I figured I needed a blog of sorts, because it would give me a place for my own notes on “How To Do Thingsâ„¢”, let me have a URL to give people, and share my ramblings about Life, the Universe and Everything Else with whoever wants to read them.
